name: She-Hulk
text: Setup: The enemy team finds a copy of Superhuman Strength and attaches it to She-Hulk. Forced Response: After an alter-ego changes to hero form, deal 1 damage to that hero.

name: She-Hulk
text: Steady. When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card. She-Hulk cannot take damage this phase. Forced Response: After an alter-ego changes to hero form, deal 1 damage to that hero.

name: She-Hulk
text: Setup: The enemy team finds a copy of Superhuman Strength and attaches it to She-Hulk. Forced Response: After an alter-ego changes to hero form, deal 1 damage to that hero.

name: She-Hulk
text: Steady. When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card. She-Hulk cannot take damage this phase. Forced Response: After an alter-ego changes to hero form, deal 1 damage to that hero.

name: Superhero Registration Act
text: Contents: Chosen leader I and II (III and IV for expert mode). Chosen leader's set, Standard set, and 3–4 modular sets. Setup: In competitive mode, the enemy team finds the Choosing Sides side scheme and your team reveals it. In cooperative mode, find the chosen leader's side scheme and reveal it.

flavor: "This could all be avoided if you'd only obey the law!" —She-Hulk
name: Enforce the Law
text:
If there is more than 1 player on your team, this stage gains hinder 2[per_hero].
The enemy leader gains steady.

flavor: Iron Man and his Avengers are ordered to apprehend any superpowered individuals who refuse to register with S.H.I.E.L.D. That includes former teammates such as Captain America and Spider-Woman.
name: Pro-Registration Tactics

flavor: Iron Man's Avengers believe so strongly in superhero reform that they lead the charge against their former teammates.
name: Mighty Avengers
text: While the enemy leader is attacking, it gets +1 ATK (+2 ATK instead if the attack is undefended). If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

name: Superhuman Strength
text:
Attach to She-Hulk. [star] Forced Interrupt: When She-Hulk attacks, this attack gains overkill. Discard this card after this attack.
[star] Boost: Reveal this card.

name: Focused Rage
text:
Attach to She-Hulk. She-Hulk gains stalwart. [star] Forced Response: After She-Hulk schemes, discard this card.
[star] Boost: Reveal this card.

flavor: "Don't make this harder than it already is!" —She-Hulk
name: One-Two Punch
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): She-Hulk schemes. Give her a tough status card. When Revealed (Hero): She-Hulk attacks you. Give her a tough status card.

name: Ground Stomp
text:
When Revealed: Exhaust each character you control. If no character was exhausted this way, this card gains surge.
[star] Boost: Exhaust a character you control.

flavor: "You messed with the wrong woman!" —She-Hulk
name: Gamma Slam
text: When Revealed: Discard the highest-cost ally or support you control. Place threat on the main scheme equal to that card's cost. If no threat is placed on the main scheme this way, this card gains surge.

name: Legal Practice
text: Threat cannot be removed from this scheme by heroes or allies. Alter-Ego Response: After you change form, exhaust your identity → remove 3 threat from this scheme.

flavor: "Unregistered super located at 43rd and Madison. Dispatch unit twelve to intercept."
name: S.H.I.E.L.D. Operator
text: Patrol. When Revealed: Place 2 threat on the main scheme.

flavor: "I knew we couldn't trust that guy." —Maria Hill
name: Strategic Overwatch
text:
When Revealed: Give the enemy leader and each minion a tough status card.
[star] Boost: Give the activating enemy a tough status card.

name: Rapid Response
text: When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until a minion is discarded. If you are in: • Alter-ego form, place threat on the main scheme equal to that minion's SCH. • Hero form, deal damage to your hero equal to that minion's ATK.

flavor: "Illegal superpowered activity has been detected in this area. Please return to your homes and take shelter!" —S.H.I.E.L.D. officer
name: Homeland Security
text:
Hinder 1[per_hero].
The first minion revealed each round gains surge.

flavor: "I'm gonna put the hurt on you, little man."
name: Atlas
text:
When Revealed: Stun your leader. Otherwise, you are stunned.
[star] Boost: Stun your leader. Otherwise, you are stunned.

flavor: "That worked better than I expected."
name: Songbird
text:
When Revealed: Confuse your leader. Otherwise, you are confused.
[star] Boost: Confuse your leader. Otherwise, you are confused.

name: Penance
text:
When Revealed: Deal 2 damage to your leader. Otherwise, deal 2 damage to a character you control.
[star] Boost: Deal 2 damage to your leader. Otherwise, deal 1 damage to a character you control.

flavor: "We're all guilty. This is justice!" —Penance
name: Justice Like Lightning
text: When Revealed: Each minion activates against the player it is engaged with. Otherwise, the enemy leader activates against you. Do not give it a boost card for this activation.

flavor: The government gave supercriminals two options: rot in prison or join the Thunderbolts.
name: The Thunderbolts
text:
Hinder 1[per_hero].
Threat cannot be removed from this scheme while a [[Thunderbolt]] minion is in play.

flavor: "I'm going to charge S.H.I.E.L.D. extra for this!"
name: Taskmaster
text: Retaliate 1. Toughness. Villainous. When Revealed: Taskmaster activates against you.

name: Taskmaster's Sword
text: Attach to Taskmaster. Otherwise, attach to the enemy leader. [star] Attached character's attacks gain piercing. Hero Action: Spend [mental] [physical] resources → discard this card.

name: Taskmaster's Shield
text: Attach to Taskmaster. Otherwise, attach to the enemy leader. Forced Interrupt: When attached character would take any amount of damage, reduce that amount by 1. Hero Action: Spend [mental] [physical] resources → discard this card.

name: Mimicked Move
text:
When Revealed: If Taskmaster is in play, he attacks your leader. Otherwise, give the enemy leader a tough status card and a facedown boost card.
[star] Boost: Give the activating enemy an additional boost card.

flavor: "You think I'm mean? Just wait 'til you're fighting Steve Rogers!" —Taskmaster
name: Taskmaster's Academy
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]. When Defeated: Give the enemy leader a tough status card and a facedown boost card.

flavor: "Ha ha! This is too great! We're being ordered to attack heroes!"
name: Jester
text: When Revealed: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. Take 1 indirect damage for each different card type discarded this way.

flavor: "I can't believe we're getting paid for this!"
name: Jack O'Lantern
text: When Revealed: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. Place 1 threat on the main scheme for each different card type discarded this way.

name: Mad Jack's Platform
text:
Attach to a minion of the enemy team's choice. Otherwise, this card gains surge. Attached minion gets +4 hit points and gains stalwart.
[star] Boost: Attach this card to a minion engaged with you.

name: Jester's Yo-Yo
text:
When Revealed: Discard the highest-cost card you control. Otherwise, this card gains surge.
[star] Boost: Discard an upgrade you control.

flavor: Ordered by S.H.I.E.L.D. to hunt down renegade heroes, Jester and Jack O'Lantern are only too happy to do their part.
name: Deadly Duo
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]. When Defeated: Each player discards the top 8 cards of their deck.

name: Vision
text: Setup: The enemy team finds Vision's mass form attachment and attaches it to Vision, Dense side faceup. Forced Response: After resolving step 1 of the villain phase, flip Vision's mass form attachment.

name: Vision
text: Steady. When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card. Vision cannot take damage this phase. Forced Response: After resolving step 1 of the villain phase, flip Vision's mass form attachment.

name: Vision
text: Setup: The enemy team finds Vision's mass form attachment and attaches it to Vision, Dense side faceup. Forced Response: After resolving step 1 of the villain phase, flip Vision's mass form attachment.

name: Vision
text: Steady. When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card. Vision cannot take damage this phase. Forced Response: After resolving step 1 of the villain phase, flip Vision's mass form attachment.

name: Superhero Resistance
text: Contents: Chosen leader I and II (III and IV for expert mode). Chosen leader's set, Standard set, and 3–4 modular sets. Setup: In competitive mode, the enemy team finds the Choosing Sides side scheme and your team reveals it. In cooperative mode, find the chosen leader's side scheme and reveal it.

flavor: By giving up the masks, heroes put themselves and their loved ones at risk.
name: Protect Secret Identities
text: If there is more than 1 player on your team, this stage gains hinder 2[per_hero]. [star] Forced Response: After resolving step 1 of the villain phase, each player discards the top 3 cards of their deck.

flavor: Captain America and his Avengers are forced to go underground or face arrest for refusing to register with S.H.I.E.L.D. When Iron Man and Captain Marvel start rounding up their superpowered friends, the resistance decides to fight back.
name: Resistance Tactics

flavor: "If we expose S.H.I.E.L.D.'s secret prison to the world, they will lose public support." —Vision
name: Expose Overreach
text: Allies enter play exhausted. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

flavor: Vision controls the molecules of his body to make himself intangible, or so dense that weapons shatter against him.
name: Dense
text: Permanent. Mass form.

flavor: "Innovation is the ultimate weapon." —Vision
name: Intangible
text: Permanent. Mass form. Forced Interrupt: When Vision would take any amount of damage, reduce that amount by 1.

name: Solar Gem
text:
Attach to Vision. Vision gains stalwart. Hero Response: After you make a basic attack against Vision, spend [energy] [physical] resources → discard this card and flip Vision's mass form attachment.
[star] Boost: Reveal this card.

name: Vision's Cape
text:
Attach to Vision. Vision gains retaliate 1. Hero Response: After you make a basic attack against Vision, spend [energy] [mental] resources → discard this card and flip Vision's mass form attachment.
[star] Boost: Reveal this card.

flavor: "Halt!" —Vision
name: Mass Increase
text: Attach to Vision. Forced Interrupt: When a character attacks Vision while the Dense attachment is in play, prevent all damage from that attack and stun the attacking character. Discard this card.

name: Density Control
text: Surge. Attach to Vision. Forced Interrupt: When Vision activates, if this activation is: • A scheme, flip Vision's mass form attachment to Intangible. • An attack, flip Vision's mass form attachment to Dense. Then, if Vision's mass form attachment flipped, discard this card.

name: Solar Beam
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Vision schemes. If the Intangible attachment is in play, Vision gets +1 SCH for this scheme. When Revealed (Hero): Vision attacks you. If the Dense attachment is in play, Vision gets +1 ATK for this attack.

flavor: "Please do not resist or I will be required to apply even greater force." —Vision
name: Superdense Strike
text: When Revealed: Exhaust a character you control. If the Dense attachment is in play, deal 2 damage to that character. If the Intangible attachment is in play, flip that attachment.

flavor: "Target neutralized." —Vision
name: Phase Disruption
text: When Revealed: The enemy team exhausts an upgrade you control. If the Intangible attachment is in play, discard that upgrade instead. If the Dense attachment is in play, flip that attachment.

flavor: Vision's phasing power makes him a difficult and unpredictable foe.
name: Just Passing Through
text: When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme confuses their identity. Otherwise, they stun their identity.

flavor: "Don't they know that WE'RE the good guys?"
name: Patriot
text: Toughness. When Revealed: Give the enemy leader a tough status card.

flavor: "Eat your heart out, Clint!"
name: Hawkeye
text: [star] Hawkeye's attacks gain piercing and ranged. When Revealed: Discard an upgrade you control.

flavor: "You shouldn't talk down to a girl who can grow two stories tall!"
name: Stature
text: Guard. When Revealed: Discard a support you control.

flavor: "Young Avengers, assemble!" —Kate Bishop
name: Teenage Superheroes
text: When Revealed: Resolve the "When Revealed" ability of each minion in play. If no "When Revealed" abilities were resolved this way, this card gains surge.

flavor: The next generation of superheroes hopes to carry on the legacy of their seniors.
name: Young Avengers
text:
Hinder 1[per_hero].
The first minion revealed each round gains surge.

flavor: "Hey! Geriatrics! Let's get a move on."
name: Speed
text: Quickstrike. When Revealed: You are stunned. Otherwise, deal 2 damage to your identity.

flavor: "You picked the wrong kids to mess with."
name: Wiccan
text: Incite 1. When Revealed: You are confused. Otherwise, place 2 threat on the main scheme.

flavor: "Didn't see that coming, did you?" Speed
name: Superspeed
text:
When Revealed: Discard 1 random card from your hand. Take indirect damage equal to its cost.
[star] Boost: Discard 1 card from your hand.

flavor: "BLINDINGFLASHBLINDINGFLASH." —Wiccan
name: Spellcasting
text: Forced Interrupt: When you play a card, cancel its effects and discard it. Then, discard this card.

flavor: Wiccan and Speed are following in the footsteps of their superhero parents: Vision and Scarlet Witch.
name: Superpowered Siblings
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]. When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme discards 1 card from their hand.

flavor: "You're in a world of trouble now."
name: Moon Knight
text: Retaliate 2. Toughness. When Revealed: Resolve the "When Revealed" ability of the topmost treachery in the encounter discard pile.

name: Crescent Dart
text: Attach to Moon Knight. Otherwise, attach to the enemy leader. [star] Forced Interrupt: When attached character attacks, this attack gains piercing and ranged. Discard this card after this attack.

flavor: "I am the Fist of Khonshu! I am vengeance!" —Moon Knight
name: Fist of Khonshu
text:
When Revealed: Exhaust your identity and deal 2 damage to it.
[star] Boost: Exhaust your identity.

name: Khonshu's Avatar
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]. When Defeated: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a treachery is discarded. Resolve that card's "When Revealed" ability.

flavor: "No one escapes the Atlantean royal guard!"
name: Janus
text: When Revealed: If you have the [[Hunted]] trait, Janus activates against you. Otherwise, discard the top 2 cards of your deck.

flavor: "My lord, Namor, has ordered you brought before him."
name: Amir
text: When Revealed: If you have the [[Hunted]] trait, Amir activates against you. Otherwise, discard the top 2 cards of your deck.

name: Atlanteans
text: When Revealed: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. If you are in: • Alter-ego form, place 1 threat on the main scheme for each different card type discarded this way. • Hero form, take 1 indirect damage for each different card type discarded this way.

name: Blood Debt
text: You gain the [[Hunted]] trait. Alter-Ego Action: Discard the top 8 cards of your deck → discard this card.

name: The Royal Guard
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]. When Defeated: The enemy team searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a copy of Blood Debt and deals it to the player who defeated this scheme as a facedown encounter card.
